news.title: Breakthrough AI Model Cracks Code of Protein Folding
news.summary: Researchers at DeepMind have developed an AI model that can accurately predict the 3D structure of proteins, a major advancement in the field of biology. This could revolutionize drug discovery and disease treatment.

news.title: AI Assistants to Become Mandatory in All New Vehicles by 2028
news.summary: The US government has announced that all new vehicles sold in the country must include a voice-activated AI assistant by 2028. The move aims to improve driver safety and accessibility through intelligent in-car technology.

news.title: AI-Powered Surveillance Cameras Detect Potential Crimes in Real-Time
news.summary: A new AI-enabled surveillance system is being rolled out in major cities, using computer vision to identify potential criminal activity and alert authorities. Privacy advocates raise concerns over the technology's implications.

news.title: AI Chatbots Becoming Indistinguishable from Humans in Conversation
news.summary: The latest generation of AI chatbots has reached a new milestone, with users increasingly unable to tell if they are talking to a human or a highly advanced language model. Experts debate the ethical implications of this technology.

news.title: Stock News Update
news.summary: Unable to fetch latest Stock news at this time. Our automated system encountered an issue. Please check back later for updates.

news.title: Presidential Election Polls Tighten Ahead of Runoff
news.summary: With the presidential election runoff just days away, the latest polls show the two candidates in a dead heat. Voter turnout and key swing states will likely determine the outcome.

news.title: Election Security Measures Ramped Up Nationwide
news.summary: Federal and state officials have implemented new security protocols to protect the integrity of the upcoming presidential election. Enhanced cybersecurity, voter ID laws, and poll monitoring are some of the key initiatives.

news.title: Candidates Face Off in Final Debate Before Election
news.summary: The two presidential candidates squared off in a heated debate last night, offering their final pitch to voters on the economy, healthcare, and foreign policy issues. Fact-checkers are still reviewing numerous claims made by both sides.

news.title: Early Voting Turnout Shatters Records Nationwide
news.summary: With just days until election day, early voting numbers have surpassed all previous presidential election cycles. Election officials cite heightened voter enthusiasm and simplified mail-in ballot procedures as key factors driving the surge.
